choices: ===> Chill in your tiny, tiny hive. (Terezi, Vriska)
===> Play a game. (Rose, Jade, Roxy, Jane)
1.content:
Your name is TREDEC OPHIUC and you are a TROLL. You are SEVEN SWEEPS OLD and frequently enjoy both SICKNASTY SPORTING EVENTS and FLAGRANT DISREGARD FOR SAFETY. You are, unfortunately, TERRIBLY INEPT at all things ATHLETIC. It's almost enough to make you feel BAD for yourself. But then your RELENTLESS OPTIMISM overrides any such compulsions. It also helps that you have AMAZING PSIONIC POWERS. But it's mostly the optimism. Your blood is a fetching shade of NONE OF ANYONE'S BUSINESS thank you very much. Also, you are a MUTANT. Your body is remarkably TINY, small enough to rest comfortably in the confines of a normal Troll's crushing fist. Despite your size, you are possessed of truly ABSURD levels of DURABILITY.

13lessing or curse, you try your GOSH-DARNDEST to stay positive.

Normally, a freak such as yourself would be CULLED, however, the IMPERIAL DRONES seem to not notice you. Or perhaps to them you seem to be some kind of LUSUS. Either way, you've managed to be a total leech, contributing nothing yet suckling on the teat of Troll society for your entire life. So CONGRATULATIONS on that, I suppose.

What will you do?
1.title: Intro

11.content:
===> Chill in your tiny, tiny hive.

You decide to take it easy, to both max and relax in your hive. Too bad your hive is frequently, to the point of suspicion, ruthlessly demolished by two other Trolls. They seem to be playing some sort of game, and no matter where you relocate it seems your hive is always in a position that is somehow vital to one's victory over the other. You don't hold it against them, though.

You would, of course, love to play such a dangerous game, and would surely enjoy the rewards thereof, but despite your apparent appeal as a game piece to be captured, being a player in such intrigue is evidently beyond you.

Today is not so different from many other days and though you try to enjoy some calm downtime, the materials which comprise your hive crack and crumble. A powerful, mighty foot comes crashing down, destroying your walls and pinning you to the cold floor beneath an even colder gaze. As you look up to meet this gaze, you recognize the face of today's winner of the search.
11.title: ===> Chill in your tiny, tiny hive. (Terezi...

choices: ===> 1NT3R3ST1NG, L3TS SH4R3 TH1S D1SCOV3RY W1TH VR1SK4... (Scourge Sisters)
111.content:
===> Redglare!

“H3H3H3... LOOKS L1K3 1 FOUND YOU F1RST TH1S T1M3, T1NY.”

She seems to mull over the things she might do with her prize. But you don't know, it could be less of a mull and more of a ponder. She rolls you about under her shoe like a wad of desperate, terrified clay.

“1 DON'T KNOW 1F 1 R34LLY H4V3 T1M3 TO PL4Y W1TH YOU, L1TTL3 ON3. VR1SK4 1S D3F1N1T3LY ST1LL S34RCH1NG, TOO. OF COURS3, 1 COULD SH4R3 MY BOUNTY TH1S T1M3, BUT WH3R3'S TH3 FUN 1N TH4T?”

She lifts her foot, and you think you may have some form of respite, but that false hope only looms over you as briefly as her other foot does, and is squashed just as quickly and brutally as you are. Actually, you think, that false hope probably got off a lot better than you did. After all, it would not have to wait around for the next bit of torture.

She peels you up off the ground at this point, and holds you in front of her face. Curiouser and curiouser, it seems.

“YOU SM3LL L1K3... HMMM, 4CTU4LLY, 1 DON'T R3COGN1Z3 YOUR P4RT1CUL4R FR4GR4NC3. 1 WOND3R HOW YOU T4ST3...?”
111.title: ===> Redglare! (Terezi)

112.content:
===> Mindfang!

The bluish hue upon the massive crushing force which destroyed your home contrasts with the stark red adorning the foot that delivered said destruction. Try as you might, you can't stop ascribing such beauteous description to this titan of giant stompy pain. Gorgeous though she may be. See? You're doing it again. Face it, she's got you planted in shmuckville as firmly as she has toe of her totally rad sneaker planted in your face.

“Heya, 8itesize.” she says, grinding your pitiful form as she pointed her foot to get a bit more oomph- oh, you mean more "oooooooomph".

“Ready for a day of 8eing on the winning team?” she flips her hair back to get a better view of your struggling impotence. Some less gracious trolls might accuse Vriska of pointless cruelty, but that's simply not the case. There most definitely is a point to her cruelty. Yes, OK, that point may simply be to satiate her sadism, but c'mon, give her a 8r8k! A girl's gotta have hobbies, right?

“Hehehehehehehehe.”

“Sorry,”

“It doesn't matter what you say, you're mine for AT LEAST a day, 8itesize.”

She rolls a thought about her head for a moment and then continues.

“8uuuuuuuut........”

“I guess I'm feeling charita8le enough to let you make one little, tiny decision.”

She whispers to you, her pointed incisors nearly grazing your body with dangerous implications as her hot breath runs all over you "Tiny decision, hahahaha, get it? ;;;;p"
112.title: ===> Mindfang! (Vriska)

12.content:
===> FLAGRANTLY DISREGARD SAFETY.

You feel that today is a good day to explore the ancient and terrible things that lurk in the depths of the Alternian seas. Or perhaps the ancient and terrible things that lurk in the depths of the Alternian psyche. What the hell. One will lead to the other, you figure.

Simply reaching the shore from where your hive is currently located will no doubt be an adventure unto itself, let alone unearthing, or perhaps more accurately UNSEAING, the great and awful secrets buried below. You recall the old Alternian saying “What has been seen cannot be UNSEAN.”

(Oh MAN was that one a zinger!)

Anyway, you now see the shore, but what's more, you spot something different today! It is some kind of structure. Just kind of jutting out and being undiscovered or whatever. You are ready to engage in some manner of enthusiastic fucking tumble right off the deep end when you notice there are actually TWO of these structures, but one is underwater.

Which one will you pursue?
12.title: ===> FLAGRANTLY DISREGARD SAFETY. (Aradia, ...

choices: ===> You land back on her. (In Shirt)
===> She comes across you again later. (Picked Up)
===> You try to catch up with her for GREAT ADVENTURE! (More Stomping)
121.content:
===> Terrestrial.

Making your way to the ruins was somehow the easy part. The hard part, you'd say, was the huge crushing weight laying you flat just seconds after navigating a treacherous series of hops, skips and jumps.

Yes, it was certainly hard, and you had plenty of chances to be as sure as you were, while being dragged along for a ride underneath one of a pair of dirt-laden, fast-moving rubber-soled pathfinders. You would have wondered who it was locomoting these instruments of exploration, but at the time you occupied your thoughts with a notion along the lines of "HOLY GO13-SMACKING, NASTY, EXPLODING, 13USINESS END OF A 13OOMSTICK DOES THIS HURT"

You may have lacked a certain adventurous curiosity, but the never-ending pain train that continued to scrape and bash you along the rocky ground was a higher caliber of troll and thought to investigate this small uneven lump underneath her foot. She paused to take a gander, squinting a bit at the misshapen, pulverized blob you had become before shrugging and pinching you between her two strongest fingers and flicking you off into the distance, smiling at the joy of resuming her adventure.
121.title: ===> Terrestrial. (Aradia)

122.content:
===> Aquatic.

You start off with some stretches. After all, your disregard for safety shouldn't come at the expense of your health. That would just be crazy. Well, OK, your disregard for safety often DOES come at the expense of your health, but how uncool is it to be taking destiny into your own hands only to be slowed down by getting a leg cramp?

Speaking of uncool, as you did your lame little stretches and took in the view, you felt a shadow overtake you. You look up, and perhaps you shouldn't have, because your new view was about to get up close and personal with a truly titanic tush.

I mean, wow. You were just so busy being a dork that you went and got yourself sat on. Talk about uncool. You tried to struggle, but the sheer weight had you paralyzed. Trapped, crushed and humiliated, you tried to look on the bright side. But light was also denied you by this colossal butt.

After a few minutes of agony, you were finally moving, though not of your own volition. You felt the rush of speed as the shapely seat you adorned was launching itself back into the water. With your head no longer wedged betwixt pounding cheek and craggy rock, you could hear a girlish giggle just before the splash that drowned your world.
122.title: ===> Aquatic. (Feferi)

choices: ===> A bouncy, but safe ride. (Make it to shore safely)
===> Slip lower. (Catch on to her somewhere else)
1222.content:
===> Get Caught. (Cleavage)

Of course, just because you were squished and flattened against a massive, nearly-bare gray cheek, you were only down there for a few minutes, which happened to apparently not be enough time for you to really stick to the rear of the comparatively massive Heiress who had happened upon you. Thus, with the impact of her body splashing deep into the water, your durable little form was knocked free, leaving you stunned and slowly sinking beneath the waves.

Whether it was unlucky or lucky that things played out this way, the tyrianblood happened to chance a glance behind her before swimming off, and took notice of something unusual floating behind her, not that you were in much of a position to notice her noticing. At least, until you had to deal with the feeling of comparatively gigantic digits curling around your tiny body, dragging you through the water like you weighed nothing. Which wasn't too far off, really.

Already seemingly huge eyes widened even further behind her goggles as she realized what you actually were, an excited grin forming on her lips as well.

"O)( my cod look at you!!! 38D You're so tinyyyy, t)(is is so amazfin!! But o)(!! You don't look like a sea-troll eit)(er, I s)(ould get you back to s)(ore 380"

You don't even really have time to react to any of that rush of fish puns and excited babbling before you're carried immediately a little bit lower, your destination soon becoming obvious as another hand pulled away the front of her swimsuit. Immediately, you were shoved between those massive mounds of flesh, two different gray "hills" squeezing around you again as she shot off towards shore.
1222.title: ===> Get Caught. (Cleavage)

12221.content:
===> A bouncy, but safe ride. (Make it to shore safely)

Outside of the intense pressure squeezing against your tiny body from all sides, the sea-troll's swimsuit apparently quite tight given her considerable cleavage, the ride back to the beach that you got wasn't all that bad. Sure, it was a tight squeeze, but it wasn't near as bad as being squashed between her ass and the unforgiving rock you found yourself on earlier. In fact, with how soft those seemingly massive mounds of gray were, as well as knowing you were between a pair of frankly incredible rumble spheres, some part of your body was even telling you to enjoy this.

However, you were pretty thankful that there wasn't too far to go back to shore, as it was a little worrying to not even be able to move or wiggle around between the admittedly-amazing breasts, as well as having to deal with them jiggling around you with every stroke of Feferi's arms. Despite being concerned about potentially slipping out of her cleavage as a result, those fears quickly turned out to be unfounded, as your world shifted around quite a bit with the Heiress reaching the shore and climbing back up onto the beach.

Soon afterwards, you finally saw a bit of light again as your potential captress (?) parted that considerable cleavage and reached in to scoop you up into her hand again, the feeling of seemingly gigantic gray digits wrapping around your body becoming something you were getting used to far more quickly than you'd prefer. Realizing that there wasn't much of a point in trying to struggle to break free, you decided to just hope that this seadweller wasn't in a particularly culling-focused mood.

"Okray sorry aboat t)(at but O)( MY COD I can't get over )(ow cute you look t)(oug)(!!! 38D Just sooooo small, but you seem reely durable too!! 380 You did okray in my cleavage at least!! I wonder how durable you are acts)(oally..."
12221.title: ===> A bouncy, but safe ride. (Make it to s...

13.content:
===> Seek companionship.

You feel a strong pull towards your fellow trolls, and despite frequently being looked DOWN upon (Ha ha, yes, that's right, size puns.) you are hopeful that today will be different. At least, you hope your efforts to not be overlooked will have a less painful result than last time.

You know of a couple trolls around these parts who could potentially help you in your quest to alleviate your loneliness. True, one of them pursued you like some form of small game lusus, only to spit out your badly chewed body when it didn't taste quite right, and the other found you passed out and sewed you into a very uncomfortable dress so tightly that you ended up stuck for hours, unable to speak up about your plight due to the cotton stuffed in your mouth. But if you let every tiny, life-threatening misstep get to you, you wouldn't be where you were right now!

Which was... where exactly? You can't seem to figure out where you ended up while reminiscing on your past near-death experiences. Oops.
13.title: ===> Seek companionship. (Nepeta, Kanaya)

choices: ===> :33 < purrhaps this little mousey will be my friend! (Cat-Scratched)
131.content:
===> In a cave.

The cave is dark from the outside, the Alternian sun entering with apprehension. Apprehension must be contagious, because your tiny heart is pitter-pattering like a jackhammer for ants or something. You know there's probably someone living there, since you've seen the light of a fire flickering out from inside on prvious outings. The occasional writhing husk of a freshly killed lusus was hardly enough warning for an INTREPID FRIENDSEEKER such as yourself! Nope. You most certainly weren't given pause by the memory of nearly being DEVOURED BODILY.

":33 < *ac saunters up to pouncing distance of her purrey*" a voice resonates against the dead silence.

Ha. Dead. Like that lusus you saw the other day. Haha. Irony.

What shaking legs? Oh, you mean THESE shaking legs? These legs are CLEARLY shaking in EXCITEMENT. There's no abject terror here.

Before any COMPLETELY HYPOTHETICAL retreat could have been rejoined, you find your whole world filled with blinding pain. You smell something vaguely musky, but not entirely animistic. And you experience a certain pinned paralysis. Looking up, you see a huge troll girl smiling down at you.

":33 < *ac confurrdently toys with her catch, knowing how compurrlete its hopelessness is*"

As she said this, her large teeth nibbled at your body and her hand rolled you around on the ground, punctuating her self-narration.

":33 < what have we here?"

":33 < a little mousey dares apurroach the mighty hunter's domain?"

":33 < you must not be too bright, little mousey >:33"

You blubber something incoherent, but she doesn't seem to hear. And it's not like you really expected take any heed anyway. It just seemed like the thing to do. Crying and screaming come naturally sometimes.

But now you are pinned by the excited girl's powerful paws, and you must await your fate, good or ill.

Let's be realistic here. It's going to be for ill.

You briefly ponder if you should be playing dead or if it's too late for that.
131.title: ===> In a cave. (Nepeta)

132.content:
===> At a tower.

You make your way to the elegant tower that overlooks the landscape you typically make your hidden home. You know that someone who owns such a picturesque piece of real estate wouldn't mind such a very small squatter. But you also know that your life is forfeit should even one troll decide to report you to an imperial drone for your aberrant existence. So, you might as well get on their good side.

As you get closer you can't help but think of the last time you were here. It would have been traumatic had you allowed even the slightest consideration for your personal well-being to enter your mind. Besides. Things CAN'T go that badly again, right? I mean, not THAT quickly.

Well, unfortunately, the cosmos is cruel. Your attempt to introduce yourself to your neighbor/landlord is cut short by the very door of their domicile. it swings downward like a drawbridge and crushes you quite thouroughly. There is a clanging sound and an increased pressure that follows, as the resident of the hive tramples your already impacted form beneath the metal door.

You have a little time to contemplate your agony before the door swings back up, carrying your mashed up body with it. But not all the way. You are flung off the door in the middle of its arc, sending you sailing through the air towards the troll you had meant to meet!

This little bit of fortune, appropriately enough, does you little good, as you are only cogent enough to grasp at whatever hanholds you pray exist at the end of your trajectory.

*WHUMPFT*

You dare to open your eyes just in time to spot the allure of a plush rump. And just in time to smash your face into its shapely spinal crevice. Your rear-first introduction doesn't go unnoticed, but you cling for DEAR HOLY LIFE HOO 13OY. Thusly, your ride's turnabout reveals nothing visible as you swing round like a piece of gaudy jewelry.

"That Was Bizzarre," came a high, sultry voice, wondering what that impact upon her butt could have been.
132.title: ===> At a tower. (Kanaya)

14.content:
===> Play a game.

You are so fucking HYPED. This game is both great and terrible. In your humble estimation, there is simply no better combination of things for a game to be. You've been chatting with someone who is, frankly, a real weirdo. But, they told you about this game and it sounds like it's more or less the BEST THING. This strange friend of yours has seemed quite curious about you when you sometimes let slip details about yourself, especially your... unique stature.

For instance, you have been corresponding about a pair of technological devices called an APPEARIFIER and a SENDIFICATOR, which you knew would not fit in your hive based on their blueprints. When you mentioned this, your friend seemed confused and intrigued. You decided not to explain just yet.

In fact, your explanation would be forthcoming, now that you had finished
building your half of this technological wonder, the SENDIFICATOR. When asked what you would like to send, you were a bit coy about it but you have decided to send YOURSELF! Your friend had warned you that there should be some tests before using the thing, lest the object you wish to send be damaged, but you can't wait any longer.

This sort of DISREGARD is just FLAGRANT enough for your tastes, so you set the timer and hop inside for the ride of your life!
14.title: ===> Play a game. (Rose, Jade, Roxy, Jane)

141.content:
=> Peril unabated.

You count down in excitement alongside the pre-set timer.
141.title: => Peril unabated. (Rose)

1411111111.content: Holy shit. You beat the game. You won. Your patience paid off and now you've unlocked the true ending. Congratulations! I'm proud, really.

141112.content:
=> SKIP IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!

OK, OK, Geez.
We'll skip it.
It just seemed appropriate to have some build up, but SOME people just have no appreciation for proper pacing.
141112.title: => SKIP IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!

choices: => You serve her rump well. (Seat Cushion)
=> She finds a new use for you. (Bath Time)
1411121.content:
=> WHOAAAAAAAHUHOOOONNNNEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!

HOLY HANNA WAS THAT A 13AD IDEA.

You've lost all sense of... well, all of your senses are lost at the moment. Oh, except for one. What was it? OH, YES. PAIN. THAT'S THE ONE. 13OY HOWDY IS THIS PAINFUL.

It's like your entire molecular structure was torn apart piece by piece and then reassembled, again piece by piece. To tell the truth, it wasn't just like that. That's what literally happened. You REALLY didn't think this through, did you?

Well, far be it from you to allow a horrible disfiguring accident to dampen your mood. By all rights it should, but hey, you're just not the kind of troll to let reality sink in too deep.

"What... is this?" You heard from outside the cubic device.

Hey! You heard something! that's progress, right?

"It... It's pink."

You don't remember being pink. But you feel something... entering you. Eeeewwwwwwwww. That is a sensation you won't soon forget. Neither is what happens next.

"It's very soft. Hmm. And pliant." She continued touching you, this time picking you up and more or less toying with your very existence.

You are twisted and mashed and even punched a little bit as she experiments with your strange form.

"It looks like it would be very comfortable." she says as your ability to see returns.

You would tremble if you weren't completely paralyzed. Her impassive face was marked by a twinge of curiosity, and it was quickly replaced with a view of the ceiling.

"Well, I haven't gotten any replies. It seems to me that the use of this object is meant to be self-evident. It certainly is resilient, so I don't think I'll be damaging it, even should its purpose be something other than that of a cushion." She said, and your trepidation rose.

Your view was then dominated by a plump rump. She looked back at you with a slight curiosity that simply crushed your spirits. And then her big round butt simply crushed your body.
1411121.title: => Be an impatient baby.

choices: She molds you into a dildo
14111211.content:
As you reform slowly, even more slowly because you're under 1000 times your weight, you feel yourself accommodated between the 2 butt cheeks of this girl you knew nothing about.

Rose: Mmmmm... this cushion thing is certainly relaxing, i wonder how would this feel bare skin

As she gets up to dispose of her skirt and underwear you start to prepare mentally for the humiliation that's approaching.

As she sits on you again, in the same position,you accommodate again in her crack, but this time you can feel all the sweat and stickiness of the teenagers butt.

Rose: Mmmmm... it does feel better. When she sat on you, you went a bit too far into her butt Ahh! this is pretty cold for a cushion... could this be molded into something else?*She gets a little wet*
14111211.title: => You serve her rump well. (Seat Cushion)

choices: => Finally get your bearings and SAY SOMETHING! (Playtime)
=> Get sat on like a scrub. (Backside)
142.content:
=> Enthusiasthma.

You are prepared to activate the timer when you remember a bit of advice your friend gave you about the molecular instability of the appearification process. You whip out a piece of protective gear. Well, OK, it's just a jumpsuit, but you seem to recall reading something about unstable molecules on the tag when you bought it. The real trick was getting the thing to shrink down to your size.

Anyway, now that your skintight defenses were prepared you set the timer and hopped into the sendificator.

After taking all the extra time to put on some dorky spandex, your patience has run thin and you speed up the timer remotely and get the heck on with it!

You feel a bit of a tug on your suit, like you're accelerating or something. But you make it to the other side and are greeted by a giant alien face.

"wow! its like an odd little action figure or something?"

Before you can answer, she reaches in and grabs you, and in her excitement you find her grip strong enough to have an effect on your breath. A bit of a negating effect, actually. You can't breathe!

"whoa, its soft... kinda like silly putty... i love silly putty!" She says, touching you on pretty much your whole body.

"whats the deal with the horns, though?" She feels the tips with her thumb and you start to get extra nervous, unsure of what she has in mind when she looks over your helpless form.

"it moves!!! what is the deal with this thing, its so weird!"

"i guess ill just ask..." She shrugs, getting back on her computer.

You are then slammed on a pillow sitting precariously on the edge of her bed. Well, maybe calling it a slam is a little uncharitable. She probably just doesn't realize her strength, maybe it was more of a toss. Still fucking hurt though.
142.title: => Enthusiasthma. (Jade)

choices: [=> Yeah, no classical literature references for me please. (Running)
143.content:
=> A dangerous toast.

You leap upon the platform constructed by the mutual genius of yourself and your erstwhile trollchum. You did most of the physical building, especially considering that it was an actual physical requirement for reasons tautologically paradoxic. The true genius, though you still credit yourself with being at least a pretty smart part of things, was your long-distance friendpal. Your interplanetary pen-palacious xeno-buddy. Your bosom-bestie, your pale-amour, your... oh, you get the idea already. Point is, she's got the smarts to make sure the software side of things is PLUM-DANDY, 13UCKO!

In terms of judgment, however, you were sure to have the lion's share. In that you were sure to claim the first bits and gorge yourself until satisfied, leaving only what morsels you deigned not to eat. Meaning that there had better be plenty of the good stuff to go 'round or else poor decisions would rule the day.

It's too bad your partner in extended metaphors happened to be one to imbibe soporifics. The number three predator of good judgement, just after lions and teen hormones.

As such, you arrive pretty much naked. With only your horns and hands to hide your shame-bulge. You looked up at your inebriated compatriot, hoping your bright head-protrusions might distract from this fact.

You weren't sure if that was the case or not, as she immediately reached for you and lifted you in her hand, which happened to cover most of you. It also gave you a feeling of disquiet as she thumbed your naked front-side and giggled.

"omg ur so sooooft!"

"except these thorny bits"

"*horny*"

"hehehe horny bits"

"ive got those too ya kno"

;)

Before you get a chance to introduce yourself (along with a few of the finer bits of Troll culture regarding modesty) she tries standing up and fails miserably. Apparently, she had placed her portion of the dual apparatus on the ground and directly below a number of glasses on a table or desk. Most of them were empty, but of course, the one you fall into as your supple form is squeezed tightly out of her flailing grip like some kind of cartoon banana shot from a very real and deadly trebuche.

You splash right in some pink drink as if with expert aim and attempt to raise yourself out of the soporific fluid, but the sides are too far apart to brace yourself against and too steep to clamber higher up on.

And then she regains her balance, and reaches instinctively for the only full
glass, bringing the edge to her lips without thinking as she scanned the room for your location.

"oh man im so sorry lil frend" she says, unsure where you laned and addressing the seemingly empty room.

"hey can u liek"

"say somth?"

"or is this sum kinda"

"accident test"

"*ancient"

"do I have to find u b4 were buds is that the law-code of the horny grayliens?" she asks, still not noticing you right under her nose.
143.title: => A dangerous toast. (Roxy)

144.content:
=> This is heavy.

You are so ready. Honestly, today represents an important date in Troll history. You're really not sure where your long-distance pal resides, exactly, but you're sure it's a doozy of a distance! What's remarkable about this distance, beyond its stupefying magnitude, is how often you have observed this far-off friend emitting Trollisms.

For every cultural gaff she committed, there was a boy howdy. Each bizarre movie title was accompanied by a shucks buster. As often as she mentioned a strained, simplified, single-quadrant romantic theory, she lets loose a tarnation. You simply had to know more about this linguistic migration!

Your excitement would have gotten you in some real trouble if it weren't for the very excellent technology available to your friend. She was apparently some sort of heir.

The journey was smooth and pleasant, and quickly juxtaposed by the terrible tumble you take once it was complete. In your haste you forgot that you lack all necessary skills involved in this endeavor and the result was a completely inaccurate jaunt. You reached out for some kind of handhold. Your voice didn't come out, obviously due to your intense levels of bravery and not at all because the wind being viscerally wrest from within your lungs.

"Where in blazes is it?" She demanded, not noticing that you had caught yourself on the lip of her loose shirt.

"This would be a lot easier if I had been informed of what was being sent, dang it!" She stomped her foot, shaking her body a little and you a lot.

She seemed to notice your wild flailings and desperate pleas because she looked down at that moment and you lost your second wind to her breathtaking hugeness. She seemed equally taken aback and stepped backwards, as if it might somehow prove your stature to be merely an illusion.

"JUMPING JEHOSHAPHAT!"

She lost balance at the realization that a tiny person was perched against her bosom, twisted her ankle andbegan to fall over. Your eyes tremble in fear as the behemoth you were clinging to toppled forward, inescapably careening into your weak squishy form. Her great, big globes came crashing down on you, laying you flat and mashing you into a whimpering paste. You could swear that you had reached the apex of pain. And then she got up.

Her heaving chest moved again and she stirred from her prone position, battering your already mangled body. But even her shift in position was no release as you stuck to her shirt, twitching and feeling the subtle movements of the fabric through your thinned-out limbs.

"Ouch. Am I seeing things?"
144.title: => This is heavy. (Jane)

15.content:
===> Sleep.

Living the wild and dangerous life of someone small enough to be lost in a purse or satchel, you find that you are often a deep enough sleeper to get a bit more out of your dreams than most. You even seem to live a better life in your dreams than when awake. That is, when you dream of the resplendent city that usually greets you, rather than the odd visit by THINGS NOT MEANT TO BE KNOWN and the ever more occasional VISIONS OF DEEPEST DREAD. But you try not to let the little things bother you.

Yeah, you're pretty cool. The way you casually dismiss dreams of total causal annihilation like that. But even the total chill that envelops your personal aura can be pierced from time to time. Like, say, at absolutely any time. By pretty much any person. I mean, you're the size of a particularly unimpressive toy. But come on. How unflappable do you even have to BE for some grudging respect around here?
Regardless of your level of flappability, you nevertheless awaken in the grand city of your dreams, but something is off. You don't sense any kind of danger, yet there is most definitely something wrong.
15.title: ===> Sleep. (Dancestors)

151.content: Your dreams take you to many places, but you eventually have to wake up...
151.title: ===> Maidens and Ships (Damara, Meulin)

choices: ===> She gives you a deep kiss. (Chu Chu)
===> She discards you like used tissue paper. (Stamped Out)
1511.content:
===> Lost in the forest.

You awaken in a... pink forrest? No, that's not quite right. You were awake before and awake now, so when did you go to sleep? You shake off the sleep as well as the existential paradox and start looking around.

You're trying to keep your hackles low, but they're just raising the fuck up all over this place. You amost think you're being watched, but promptly discard that notion as you make your way to the largest tree you can see.

Before getting there, though, you feel a shockwave of power as a giant foot, clad in some sort of leather shoe, slams down right in front of you. You are knocked right the fuck on your ass and look up in terror at the monster of a woman giving you an evil look.

「あなたは小さなものを見て、美味しいです。私はあなã Ÿの一口を与えなければならないのか?」

You couldn't figure out what she was saying, but that look on her face and that predatory smile told you all you wanted to know. This lady-zilla was bad news and it was time to abscond the fuck out of there.

「たぶん、あなたに私は大きな、大きな乗り心地を提供ã —ています...」

And at that second, completely indecipherable (don't even try to translate it, there's no point!) utterance, she reached out of the sky and gripped you tightly in her painted fingertips and squeezed. Then she squeezed you again, only this time it was right between her massive rumblespheres. You could feel their soft flesh crushing the life out of you and it felt a lot colder and firmer than you expected. This girl knew how to support herself and you were now suffering for it.

What fate befalls you next? You shudder to contemplate it as she laughs icily at your plight.

「のための楽しいゲーム私の貴重な小さな一時間。」
1511.title: ===> Lost in the forest.

choices: ===> (=^•ω•^=) I CAN'T S33 YOU, BUT I CAN SMELL YOU!!!!!!!!! (Prey)
===> Don't move and she can't see you! (Bored Meow)
1512.content:
===> Lily-pad cloudscape.

You feel a cool breeze on your cheek and snap your eyes open. All around you are clouds and beneath you a green shimmering leaf or flower or something really kitsch and tasteless like that. The platform seems to be floating in the sky itself which, yeah, seems pretty weird to you.

You can't really enjoy the view much, though, as a huge pair of energetic legs approach you and cause the novelty flying stationary to shimmy and shake. Subtle for the owner of these travel stalks, yet hardly conducive to your tiny upright posture. You tumble about as your footing betrays you, but you manage to get a look at the big jerk rocking the boat.

Like most trolls, she is at least ten times larger than you. And maybe she thinks that garish oversized sweater with the cats on it was going to conceal just how big a certain part of her was, but each bounding stomp made it more and more clear. You gulp as her bouncing sweater kittens loom over you.

Suddenly, with the grace and terror of a bolt of lightning, she leaps across the platform and pounces on a conspicuous black chest and retrieves something. But holy DAMN did that scare you. You are still on your ass after being knocked down by that malarkey.

Seeing the power in those legs didn't really make you want to get any closer to them, but this girl was pretty much the only thing you could see in any direction, so you mosey as cautiously as you are able.

She sniffs the air a bit and you see a hungry glint in her eye that sets you back a bit, but... maybe you're just being paranoid, right?

She seems nice, right?

Right...?
1512.title: ===> Lily-pad cloudscape. (Meulin)

152.content: Your dreams take you to many places, but you eventually have to wake up...
152.title: ===> Vamps and Rads (Porrim, Latula)

1521.content:
===> Derspit dreaming.

You find yourself climbing a staircase, but can't for the life of you recall beginning this task, or why you would even want to complete it. And yet still you keep climbing. You are actually kind of curious about what is atop this set of stairs, but MAN is this arduous! Who made stairs this big anyway? Some kind of... big person?

Well, you may not ever meet whoever was responsible, but you were about to meet someone else. Specifically, you met the very fashionable underside of a very fashionable shoe worn by a very fashionable troll. You couldn't tell that she was fashionable from beneath her leather pump, but trust us, she is.
Maybe you'll appreciate it later, when you're not being ground under the sole of her shoe during her ascent (which was happening much faster than yours ever would have).

In fact, here comes your chance now. She inspects your battered form, holding her shoe in her hand to see the odd lump that had unbalanced her. You reform a bit and she drops her shoe with a start. You expected some sort of really unfair fight to occur, but when you clamber out from underneath the discarded footwear, the highly fashionable troll, who is still just as fashionable despite her unshod state, is looking upon you with... desire?

You aren't sure, but you don't like it.

“Well, hello+ little darling...” she says as she reaches out for you. She licks her lips and smiles while she holds you in her tattooed hand.

“What do+ yo+u think I sho+uld do+ with yo+u, hmm?”
1521.title: ===> Derspit dreaming. (Porrim)

1522.content:
===> Bursting into hives.

You squint a bit and look around you, but things are a bit dark. You can hear some breathing and hope you're not in a literal nightmare.

The tiny guy always goes first in the movies. Which is probably the only reason that you love “In-Which-A-Mythical-Trickster-Murders-People-Who-Have-Stolen-His-Pot-Of-Gold- But-Is-Ultimately-Defeated-By-A-Young-Swearing-Boy” so much. That, and it is a film which is classy as fuck.

Where were you? Oh, yeah, in some humongous beast's lair or something. Whew boy. Oughta look out.

In a flash of activity, you see some big billowing movement and hear the resounding THUD of a pair of bare feet landing on the ground. And almost immediately, there's light! Whoever is in here with you has turned it on, but they're moving so fast that you end up dizzy with panic.

“H3ck y34h, t1m3 to tot4lly PWN th3 d4y!!!” comes a way awesome voice. You notice that the pwner of that voice is wearing very little on her bodacious body. You are now feeling a certain flushed sensation all over your stupefied face. You decide to hide, and scamper over some discarded clothes, but that turned out to be PRETTY 13LAMED STUPID.

Yeah. Turns out she's putting on those clothes. 'cause she's mostly naked. You really should have seen that coming, lack of light notwithstanding.
1522.title: ===> Bursting into hives. (Latula)

153.content: Your dreams take you to many places, but you eventually have to wake up...
153.title: ===> Thirsty and Salty (Aranea, Meenah)

1531.content:
===> Trouble beach.

You shake the sleep from your eyes and the sand from your hair. Hold on a hot minute - sand? why is there sand in your hive?

No, you are not in your hive, dummy. You're on a beach. Of course there's sand on a beach. Wow, are you dense or something?

This beach is actually pretty barren, though. You can smell the water but the pint-sized dunes block your pint-sized line of sight, so you can't see the ocean. What you can see, though, is some kind of construction project underway. There's a giant blue gal setting up shop here apparently.

Well, you aren't one to let good judgment ruin bad decisions, so you head on up to the work in progress and its constructor for some flabbergasting reason.

That's when reality reared its ugly head. And when a giant red-shod foot reared its heavy sand-covered bottom. She was stepping back to examine her handywork and you feel the full brunt of her weight as her heel shifts in the sand. It's really fucking heavy.

But there is more in store for you than the crushing might of this girl's rather hefty legs. It turns out that you're not a very handy foothold. You lack traction. And so, she tumbles.

The pratfal this girl takes would make the pros blush. Her legs lock and slide upwards with the switfness of a bazooka-powered banana cream pie and her arms gyrate with the celerity of a mighty seltzer-squirter. She actually seems to gain momentum on her upwards swing, creating more distance between her and the sandy ground. And, by extension, more velocity on her way back down on top of you.

You open your eyes just in time to lament your veiw of the meteoric backside of your - admittedly quite plush - doom.

The crash is intense and you feel a powerful pain coursing through you as she lands, crushing you stupid with her big round rump. You moan in the darkness of the crack that just broke your back.

She tenderly rubs the crushing orbs that presently have you painfully pinned and winces, showing a little fang out the corner of her mouth.

"Ow. That was certainly em8arrassing. I sincerely hope that I am still alone for at least a few more moments..."
1531.title: ===> Trouble beach. (Aranea)

1532.content:
===> Rebel swag.

The place is dark. Like. REALLY dark. Is it an observatory? Fuck if you know. But there is a giant gold statue in the center. Though, that's kind of the only thing here, which kind of freaks you the fuck out.

You're getting a sneaking suspicion that you should respect and/or fear the figure presented in gold. You're leaning more towards the fear side. This feeling would prove to be highly warranted in a moment, as the imposing presence creeps up on you.

Wherever you are, it is clearly the domain of the statue's likeness. She starts laughing, you turn towards her now revealed face, and she-ROWS OF TEETH WHOA JEEZ! You scamper the fuck away from that toothy grin, but she is really not having that. You're gripped tightly by her clammy hands and by your own fear.

She holds you up to her fuchsia goggles and addresses you directly.

“)(--------EY"

"looks like i caught me some fishbait 38D”

Then you feel an oppressive force on the top of your head as she thumbs you with her gray digit.

“so shrimp ready for some fun”

You shake your head no, you are not ready, but she just squeezes you harder, causing your eyes and really just your whole face to bulge between her forefinger and thumb, continuing to laugh at your pain

“too bad cuz im gonna play with you anyway 38)”

“i mean yall are trespassin”

She shrugs, not really buying or selling that weak excuse to torment you.

“i dont usually play the hemospectrum carp”

“but youre just SO inferior”

“i gotta push you around a little bit ya know”

“its like my primal instincts or somefin”

You struggle but she just twists you around while thinking about how she wishes to PUNISH you.

Hah, get it? Because fish puns.
1532.title: ===> Rebel swag. (Meenah)

info.brief_description: You are a tiny sassy teen troll in the Homestuck universe who is destined for flatness.
info.description:
Somewhere very far away a bunch of stupid kids are engaged in some ridiculous bullshit. This is not their story.

This story is pretty much just an excuse to indulge in a bunch of my fetishes. If you have those fetishes, too, then I guess you'll stick around.

Not really planning on any male characters, but it's not like I'll flip the fuck out if someone puts them in anyways. Though if a chapter is stupid or terrible enough I'll probably delete it.

Are there other Homestuck interactives similar to this one? I'll bet there are. But they don't cater to me, specifically, so here we are.

Don't be afraid to add your own chapters, especially if there's a character I missed that you want to see included!
